summary:
Judaism is an ancient religion and cultural tradition followed by the Jewish people. It believes in one God and is based on the teachings of the Torah, the first five books of the Hebrew Bible. Jews consider themselves part of a covenant, or agreement, with God. This religion has many texts and traditions, and it has influenced other Abrahamic religions like Christianity and Islam.

There are different groups within Judaism, each with its own beliefs about Jewish law and religious practices. Some Jews follow strict rules, while others are more liberal. Today, most Jews live in Israel, the United States, and Canada.
title: Judaism
